svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Relative difference in global population estimates, UN vs. US Census Bureau
Relative difference in global and regional population estimates between UN population division and US Census
Bureau sources, measured as the difference as a percentage of UN figures (i.e.UN minus US Census Bureau
values, divided by UN population figures). Negative figures therefore indicate lower UN estimates relative to the US
Source: Differences in population estimates, OWID based on UN vs US Census Bureau
